metadata.Title: CVE-2014-6251 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Stack-based buffer overflow in CPUMiner before 2.4.1 allows remote attackers to have an unspecified impact by sending a mining.subscribe response with a large nonce2 length, then triggering the overflow with a mining.notify request.

criterions.comment: cgminer package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
